Player History
Injured on 6/25/1985 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1986, off Bruce Hurst (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/1986, off Mike Schooler (SEA)...
Injured on 5/14/1987 with a Fractured Hip, out for 6 weeks...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,607,143 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,664,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Detroit to Atlanta on 4/26/1989 (Going to ATL: C Matt Nokes, 1B Will Clark. Going to DET: P Tom Glavine, P Chris Hammond, C Jerry Willard, LF Glenn Wilson, 1B Larry Sheets)...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,664,286 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,664,286 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/1991, hitting .409 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/4/1992 to a 4-year deal worth $3,423,000 per year...
